H0.text: To the nearest two, how many tennis Grand Slam titles did Jimmy Connors win. 8

H1.text: To the nearest two, how many tennis Grand Slam titles did Jimmy Connors win. 12

A4.text: His titles include eight singles majors (an Open Era joint-record five US Opens, two Wimbledons, one Australian Open)
